thread.title: Miriram B Medina-Rosas
thread.title_full: HablaMexico.com reviewed by Miriram B Medina-Rosas

author: Miriram B Medina-Rosas
title: Miriram B Medina-Rosas
text: Is really convenient & fast.I been using also Xoom reaload but was a problem when One of d numbers in file change networt .I wasn't able to change myself & I have to wait 24 to 48 hrs.& my Son really need it the cell reload.With hablar mexico was fast ,the only thing is the fee at habla mexico is a bit higher.But still Very quick service.
